HugoAgent Documentation Welcome to the HugoAgent documentation! Here you’ll find everything you need to get started with your Hugo site.
Getting Started This documentation will help you:
Set up your development environment Create and customize content Deploy your site Contribute to the project Quick Start Clone the repository Install dependencies Run hugo server Start creating content!

title: Documentation

body:
Welcome to HugoAgent Learn More View on GitHub Your AI-powered documentation companion built with Hugo and Docsy!
HugoAgent provides a modern, fast, and beautiful documentation platform. Built with Hugo's speed and Docsy's elegant design, it's perfect for creating professional documentation sites. Fast & Modern Built with Hugo’s lightning-fast static site generation and modern web technologies.
Open Source Fully open source and hosted on GitHub. Contribute and customize as needed.
Easy to Deploy Deploy anywhere with simple static files. GitHub Pages, Netlify, or any web server.
Ready to get started? Check out our documentation to learn how to use HugoAgent for your projects. Get Started
